<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_898711_library_m.CheckOverdue</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>On demand
Checks if user's overdue fee is more than P100</description><name>CheckOverdue</name><script><![CDATA[function CheckOverdue(user) {
	var patron = new GlideRecord('x_898711_library_m_book_transaction');
// 	books.addAggregate('SUM', 'u_field_name_2');
	patron.addQuery('u_field_name_1', user);
	patron.query();
	
	var x=0;
	while (books.next()) {
		x++;
	}
	return x;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-24 04:45:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>5314c56897f251103e1f7cb0f053af1c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckOverdue</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Library Management System" source="x_898711_library_m">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Library Management System">bf42c94f971211103e1f7cb0f053af8b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5314c56897f251103e1f7cb0f053af1c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-24 04:45:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
